title: Reset password
content: Get instruction sent to this email that explain how to reset your password.
contentWithPhoneEmail: Get instruction sent to this email or phone number that explain how to reset your password.
success: Submitting forgot password form is success.
failed: Submitting forgot password form is failed.
successPhone: Submitting forgot password form with phone : {{phone}} is success.
successEmail: If there is an account associated with {{email}} you will receive an email with a link to reset your password
failedEmail: There is no account associated with email : {{email}}
failedPhone: There is no account associated with phone number : {{phone}}
successEmail1: If there is an account associated with
successEmail2: you will receive an email with a link to reset your password
emailSent: An email has been sent to you. Please check your email.
weWillSendEmail: We will send you an email to reset your password
